tool.name: SAGA.grid_tools.25
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGRID False isArrayMASK False output_data_CLOSED $output_data_CLOSED name SAGA.grid_tools.25 GRID $GRID MASK $MASK MAXGAPCELLS $MAXGAPCELLS MAXPOINTS $MAXPOINTS LOCALPOINTS $LOCALPOINTS EXTENDED $EXTENDED NEIGHBOURS $NEIGHBOURS RADIUS $RADIUS RELAXATION $RELAXATION prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CLOSED $OutputSection_CLOSED.outputType_CLOSED transmissionMode_CLOSED $OutputSection_CLOSED.transmissionMode_CLOSED

param.name: GRID
param.label: Grid
param.help: Grid The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, png, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: MASK
param.label: Mask
param.help: Mask The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, png, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: MAXGAPCELLS
param.label: Only Process Gaps with Less Cells
param.help: is ignored if set to zero

param.name: LOCALPOINTS
param.label: Number of Points for Local Interpolation
param.help: Number of Points for Local Interpolation

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CLOSED
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CLOSED
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
